title: Title Unknown
description: A posthumous edition of a vertically oriented, rectangular, monochromatic abstract woodblock print produced by the artist's son, Onchi Kunio (1920-2001).
dimensions:
paper: H. 19.9 x W. 13.9 cm (7 13/16 x 5 1/2 in.)
printed image: H. 12.1 x W. 8.4 cm (4 3/4 x 3 5/16 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Gift of Elizabeth and Neil Swinton
